## SocketSubject class

Subject that wraps a WebSocketSubject and provides a Subject interface for sending and receiving messages.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class SocketSubject<T> extends Subject<T> 
```
**Extends:** Subject&lt;T&gt;

## Remarks

An alias to RxJS Subject.
